mn87:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn87:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena annatarassa gahapatissa ekaputtako piyo manapo kalankato hoti.
mn87:2.2: Tassa kalankiriyaya neva kammanta patibhanti na bhattam patibhati.
mn87:3.1: Atha kho so gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho tam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
mn87:3.2: “na kho te, gahapati, sake citte thitassa indriyani, atthi te indriyanam annathattan”ti.
mn87:3.4: mayhanhi, bhante, ekaputto piyo manapo kalankato.
mn87:3.5: Tassa kalankiriyaya neva kammanta patibhanti, na bhattam patibhati.
mn87:3.12: Piyajatika hi kho, bhante, anandasomanassa piyappabhavika”ti.
mn87:3.13: Atha kho so gahapati bhagavato bhasitam anabhinanditva patikkositva utthayasana pakkami.
mn87:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula akkhadhutta bhagavato avidure akkhehi dibbanti.
mn87:4.2: Atha kho so gahapati yena te akkhadhutta tenupasankami; upasankamitva akkhadhutte etadavoca:
mn87:4.3: “idhaham, bhonto, yena samano gotamo tenupasankamim; upasankamitva samanam gotamam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidim. Ekamantam nisinnam kho mam, bhonto, samano gotamo etadavoca:
mn87:4.4: ‘na kho te, gahapati, sake citte thitassa indriyani, atthi te indriyanam annathattan’ti.
mn87:4.5: Evam vutte, aham, bhonto, samanam gotamam etadavocam:
mn87:4.7: mayhanhi, bhante, ekaputtako piyo manapo kalankato.
mn87:4.8: Tassa kalankiriyaya neva kammanta patibhanti, na bhattam patibhati.
mn87:4.15: Piyajatika hi kho, bhante, anandasomanassa piyappabhavika’ti.
mn87:4.16: Atha khvaham, bhonto, samanassa gotamassa bhasitam anabhinanditva patikkositva utthayasana pakkamin”ti.
mn87:4.19: Atha kho so gahapati “sameti me akkhadhuttehi”ti pakkami.
mn87:5.1: Atha kho idam kathavatthu anupubbena rajantepuram pavisi.
mn87:5.2: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo mallikam devim amantesi:
mn87:5.6: “Evameva panayam mallika yannadeva samano gotamo bhasati tam tadevassa abbhanumodati:
mn87:5.8: Seyyathapi nama, yannadeva acariyo antevasissa bhasati tam tadevassa antevasi abbhanumodati:
mn87:5.10: Evameva kho tvam, mallike, yannadeva samano gotamo bhasati tam tadevassa abbhanumodasi:
mn87:6.1: Atha kho mallika devi nalijangham brahmanam amantesi:
mn87:6.2: “ehi tvam, brahmana, yena bhagava tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandahi, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam puccha:
mn87:6.3: ‘mallika, bhante, devi bhagavato pade sirasa vandati, appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam pucchati’ti;
mn87:6.5: ‘bhasita nu kho, bhante, bhagavata esa vaca—
mn87:6.7: Yatha te bhagava byakaroti tam sadhukam uggahetva mama aroceyyasi.
mn87:6.9: “Evam, bhoti”ti kho nalijangho brahmano mallikaya deviya patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn87:6.10: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho nalijangho brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn87:6.11: “mallika, bho gotama, devi bhoto gotamassa pade sirasa vandati; appabadham appatankam lahutthanam balam phasuviharam pucchati;
mn87:6.13: ‘bhasita nu kho, bhante, bhagavata esa vaca—
mn87:8.1: Tadaminapetam, brahmana, pariyayena veditabbam yatha piyajatika sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa piyappabhavika.
mn87:8.2: Bhutapubbam, brahmana, imissayeva savatthiya annatarissa itthiya mata kalamakasi.
mn87:8.3: Sa tassa kalakiriyaya ummattika khittacitta rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva evamaha:
mn87:8.4: ‘api me mataram addassatha, api me mataram addassatha’ti?
mn87:9-14.1: Iminapi kho etam, brahmana, pariyayena veditabbam yatha piyajatika sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa piyappabhavikati.
mn87:9-14.2: Bhutapubbam, brahmana, imissayeva savatthiya annatarissa itthiya pita kalamakasi …
mn87:9-14.8: Sa tassa kalakiriyaya ummattika khittacitta rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva evamaha:
mn87:9-14.9: ‘api me samikam addassatha, api me samikam addassatha’ti?
mn87:15-21.1: Iminapi kho etam, brahmana, pariyayena veditabbam yatha piyajatika sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa piyappabhavikati.
mn87:15-21.2: Bhutapubbam, brahmana, imissayeva savatthiya annatarassa purisassa mata kalamakasi.
mn87:15-21.3: So tassa kalakiriyaya ummattako khittacitto rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva evamaha:
mn87:15-21.4: ‘api me mataram addassatha, api me mataram addassatha’ti?
mn87:15-21.5: Iminapi kho etam, brahmana, pariyayena veditabbam yatha piyajatika sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa piyappabhavikati.
mn87:15-21.6: Bhutapubbam, brahmana, imissayeva savatthiya annatarassa purisassa pita kalamakasi …
mn87:15-21.12: So tassa kalakiriyaya ummattako khittacitto rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva evamaha:
mn87:15-21.13: ‘api me pajapatim addassatha, api me pajapatim addassatha’ti?
mn87:15-21.14: Iminapi kho etam, brahmana, pariyayena veditabbam yatha piyajatika sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa piyappabhavikati.
mn87:22.1: Bhutapubbam, brahmana, imissayeva savatthiya annatara itthi natikulam agamasi.
mn87:22.2: Tassa te nataka samikam acchinditva annassa datukama.
mn87:22.4: Atha kho sa itthi samikam etadavoca:
mn87:22.5: ‘ime, mam, ayyaputta, nataka tvam acchinditva annassa datukama.
mn87:22.7: Atha kho so puriso tam itthim dvidha chetva attanam upphalesi:
mn87:22.9: Iminapi kho etam, brahmana, pariyayena veditabbam yatha piyajatika sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa piyappabhavika”ti.
mn87:23.1: Atha kho nalijangho brahmano bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana yena mallika devi tenupasankami; upasankamitva yavatako ahosi bhagavata saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam mallikaya deviya arocesi. Atha kho mallika devi yena raja pasenadi kosalo tenupasankami; upasankamitva rajanam pasenadim kosalam etadavoca:
mn87:24.5: vajiriya te kumariya viparinamannathabhava uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
mn87:24.6: “Vajiriya me, mallike, kumariya viparinamannathabhava jivitassapi siya annathattam, kim pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
mn87:24.7: “Idam kho tam, maharaja, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sandhaya bhasitam:
mn87:25.4: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, vasabhaya te khattiyaya viparinamannathabhava uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
mn87:25.5: “Vasabhaya me, mallike, khattiyaya viparinamannathabhava jivitassapi siya annathattam, kim pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
mn87:25.6: “Idam kho tam, maharaja, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sandhaya bhasitam:
mn87:26.1: Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, piyo te vitatubho senapati”ti?
mn87:26.3: “Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, vitatubhassa te senapatissa viparinamannathabhava uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
mn87:26.4: “Vitatubhassa me, mallike, senapatissa viparinamannathabhava jivitassapi siya annathattam, kim pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
mn87:26.5: “Idam kho tam, maharaja, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sandhaya bhasitam:
mn87:27.1: Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, piya te ahan”ti?
mn87:27.5: “Tuyhanhi me, mallike, viparinamannathabhava jivitassapi siya annathattam, kim pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
mn87:27.6: “Idam kho tam, maharaja, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sandhaya bhasitam:
mn87:28.4: Kasikosalanam, mallike, anubhavena kasikacandanam paccanubhoma, malagandhavilepanam dharema”ti.
mn87:28.7: “Kasikosalananhi, mallike, viparinamannathabhava jivitassapi siya annathattam, kim pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa”ti?
mn87:28.8: “Idam kho tam, maharaja, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sandhaya bhasitam:
mn87:29.2: Yavanca so bhagava pannaya ativijjha manne passati.
mn87:29.4: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo utthayasana ekamsam uttarasangam karitva yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva tikkhattum udanam udanesi:
